achievements.title: Innocent One
achievements.desc: Puritan, oblivious, or serial killer in the making? Either way, you made it through No Man's Land without glimpsing a single bra. Good job!

achievements.title: I Watch Anime Only for the "Plot"...
achievements.desc: It's not your fault that there is so much fan service... Right?

achievements.title: Only Accidents! I Swear!
achievements.desc: Physics in anime are incredible. When you trip, you always cop a feel.

achievements.title: Hentai Overlord
achievements.desc: No use denying it! You know what you are...
